description: Detecting suspicious log events which lead to potential security threats
name: Wildify Anomaly_High
query: message: "SSL support has been enabled but no security domain or client/server SSL contexts have been specified" or message : "Could not create redirect URI" or message : "A valid JNDI name must be provided:" or message : "Rejecting call because it is not part of any XTS transaction" or message : "Failed to parse" or message : "Failed to construct component instance" or message : "attempt to add a Permission to a readonly PermissionCollection" or message : "Shutting down process controller" or message : "Cannot resolve com.mysq.jdbc.ReplicationConnection.ping method. Will use 'SELECT 1' instead." or message : "Invalid User" or message : "Failed to create instance." or message : "Failed to init SSLContext" or message : "Failed to get SSLContext for TLS algorithm"  or message: "Missing mandatory part of JASPI configuration in the security domain."  or message:  "Failed to verify password in JAAS callbackhandler" or message:  "Authorization failed" or message: "only string password accepted"
